name: Spicy Chicken Wings
description: Crispy, golden chicken wings marinated in a fiery blend of hot chili, garlic, paprika, and a dash of cayenne pepper. They offer a bold, spicy kick with a hint of tanginess from a vinegar-based sauce, and are served with a cooling blue cheese dip to balance the heat.

name: Paneer Tikka Masala
description: Soft cubes of paneer marinated in a yogurt mixture with red chili powder, turmeric, and garam masala. Grilled to perfection and simmered in a creamy, tomato-based sauce enriched with fenugreek and cumin. Offers moderate spice with a rich, savory finish.

name: Pepperoni Pizza
description: A classic Italian-style pizza with a thin, crispy crust, zesty tomato sauce, and a generous layer of melted mozzarella. Topped with spicy pepperoni slices and a sprinkle of red pepper flakes to add a subtle heat without overwhelming the palate.

name: Veggie Delight Burger
description: A hearty burger made from a blend of black beans, quinoa, and spices. Topped with fresh lettuce, tomato, and avocado, it offers a mildly spiced, satisfying flavor profile. Perfect for those who desire a fulfilling yet non-spicy option.

name: Sichuan Spicy Noodles
description: Stir-fried noodles tossed in a bold Sichuan sauce featuring chili oil, garlic, and Sichuan peppercorns that deliver a vibrant, tongue-tingling heat with a numbing sensation. Includes tender beef slices and crisp vegetables for a complex, layered flavor.

name: Mild Butter Chicken
description: Tender chicken pieces simmered in a creamy, buttery tomato sauce with mild spices such as cumin and coriander. This dish is rich and comforting, offering a velvety texture and subtle spice that appeals to those who prefer less heat.

name: Spicy Lamb Curry
description: Slow-cooked lamb in a robust, aromatic curry sauce with red chili, ginger, garlic, and a blend of Indian spices. This curry is known for its deep, intense heat balanced by savory flavors, making it a top pick for spice enthusiasts.

name: Hot and Sour Soup
description: A light, flavorful soup with a clear broth seasoned with chili paste, vinegar, and a hint of soy sauce. Loaded with mushrooms, tofu, and bamboo shoots, this soup offers a gentle spicy warmth paired with a refreshing sour tang.

name: Spicy Shrimp Tacos
description: Grilled shrimp tossed in a spicy chipotle marinade, served in soft corn tortillas with crisp cabbage, avocado slices, and a zesty lime crema. The tacos are bursting with flavor and offer a satisfying, spicy crunch.

name: Crispy Falafel Wrap
description: Homemade falafel made from ground chickpeas and herbs, deep-fried until crisp. Wrapped in a soft pita with fresh lettuce, tomatoes, cucumbers, and drizzled with a tangy tahini sauce. A flavorful, aromatic option with a gentle spice level.

name: Buffalo Cauliflower Bites
description: Crispy cauliflower florets battered and baked, then tossed in a tangy buffalo sauce made with hot sauce and a hint of garlic. Served with a side of ranch dressing, these bites offer a spicy, crunchy, and satisfying snack.

name: Grilled Salmon with Chili Glaze
description: Fresh salmon fillet grilled to perfection and brushed with a sweet and spicy chili glaze. The glaze is a blend of chili sauce, honey, and lime juice, providing a balance of heat and sweetness that enhances the natural flavor of the salmon.

name: Spicy Thai Basil Stir-Fry
description: A vibrant stir-fry featuring thinly sliced chicken, bell peppers, and green beans, cooked with fresh Thai basil and a spicy sauce made from red chilies, garlic, and soy sauce. This dish offers a punch of heat and aromatic herbal notes.

name: Quinoa and Black Bean Salad
description: A refreshing salad with protein-packed quinoa, black beans, cherry tomatoes, corn, and avocado, tossed in a zesty lime-cilantro dressing. While not spicy by default, it can be made with a kick by adding a dash of chili powder or fresh jalape√±os.

name: Chili Chocolate Brownie
description: Decadent, fudgy brownie infused with a subtle hint of chili pepper that accentuates the rich chocolate flavor. This dessert offers a unique twist where the warmth of chili complements the sweetness of the chocolate, making it a delightful finish to any meal.
